title: How to become an English writer within few months - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not quite sure what you mean but I assume you mean somebody who writes and publishes in English. There are a lot if internet sites which will publish articles or stories (although not always pay). Likewise, you vould look for a newspaper or magazine which will accept articles, stories etc. For example, I have published over 40 articles on culture and teaching in an English teaching magazine (no money but I get free books). I also publish stories in a fiction magazine.
It should be “within *a* few months. But the way you become an English writer is to write things, in English. Also read things in English. A lot! Good luck!
